attributes.action: Back John Reid and Sack Richard Brunstrom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: following the recent actions in trying to highlight the dangers of speeding in a gross manner of publishing pictures without consent of relatives. Its about time North Wales Police recruited someone with some common sense & compassion

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
